member.name: T:jQueryFunctions.FunctionContext
member.summary: Base class for argument wrappers of dynamic function targets called via Create methods.

member.name: M:jQueryFunctions.FunctionContext.Create(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a dynamic function targetting a static method from type with signature: public static anyReturnTypeOrVoid Method(OftenDOMElement handlerThis, object[] arguments)

member.name: M:jQueryFunctions.FunctionContext.CreateEmpty(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a dynamic function targetting a static method that does not pass handler arguments.

member.name: M:jQueryFunctions.FunctionContext.CreateForContext(System.Type,System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Creates a dynamic function targetting a static method from type with signature but wraps arguments: public static anyReturnTypeOrVoid Method(OftenDOMElement handlerThis, FunctionContext context)

member.name: M:jQueryFunctions.FunctionContext.CreateWithArguments(System.Type,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a dynamic function like others, but allows passing arguments in addition to the standard signature. The arguments are passed in the function body literally, so must be in the global scope or fully qualified.

member.name: M:jQueryFunctions.FunctionContext.CreateWithArgumentsForContext(System.Type,System.String,System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Creates a dynamic function like others, with an additional literal argument list and wrapped arguments.

member.name: T:Global
member.summary: Interface of the jQuery method exposed as members of an extensible static class whose memebers will be global.

member.name: T:jQuery.fn
member.summary: Interface of the "static" jQuery method members. References render to jQuery.fn based on namespace.

member.name: T:jQuery.fx
member.summary: Provides access to the jQuery.fx.off global effects override.

member.name: T:jQuery.Elements
member.summary: Interface of the jQuery result object.

member.name: T:jQueryInterfaces.Position
member.summary: Interface of the jQuery position object.

member.name: T:jQueryInterfaces.EventState
member.summary: Inteface of the jQuery Event object.

member.name: T:jQueryInterfaces.AjaxOptions
member.summary: Inteface of the jQuery AJAX options object.

member.name: T:jQueryInterfaces.Support
member.summary: Inteface of the jQuery support object.
